chart_description: This chart displays the rate at which merged discard operations occurred in the disk. Discard operations are used to inform the storage device which data blocks are no longer in use and can be erased, allowing the device to free up space.

dimension_descriptions.discards: The number of discarded data blocks merged into a single operation per second. A high number of discards indicates that the disk is likely experiencing a lot of write operations, which may result in decreased performance over time.
